description.value:
Characters with the Cosmopolitan background were influenced by many cultures. A cosmopolitan culture is one that includes and encourages members of different world cultures to come together. In most campaign settings, there will be several urban centers where members of any culture are welcome. Most of the time, these cosmopolitan cities are trade hubs, often located along water, and they usually have a large population.

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.5l8QNlgPDPOHpGID]{Languages}: Common and three others (usually @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.5l8QNlgPDPOHpGID.JournalEntryPage.t1Js6zSa30XvbceF]{Trade Languages})

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.rv19GFzEa0nMTuAF]{Skills}: three of your choice: (Recommended: &reference[Persuasion], &reference[Insight], and either &reference[Deception] or &reference[Investigation])

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN]{Tools and Vehicles}: Any @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN]{Tool} or @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN.JournalEntryPage.wuMEnZz82yY02Dok#vehicles]{Vehicle type} of your choice

Items: the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN]{Tools} (but not @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN.JournalEntryPage.wuMEnZz82yY02Dok#vehicles]{Vehicles}) you gained proficiency with above

Starting Gold: 30 gold, which can be spent at character creation to buy nonmagical equipment at base cost.

Feats: one of:

  • @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-feats.Item.FkPsCpJ1MAE2Slu1]{Crafter}

  • @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-feats.Item.5xzfeU0btClghl28]{Dabbler}

  • @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-feats.Item.dnBQZIbOg0aa3khp]{Polyglot}

In the world of Elkan, the country of Karsa is a cosmopolitan place built for the wealthy to partake of extravagant pleasures at the expense of the lower classes and slaves. Outside Karsa, the cities of Mothside City, Ka'uhane, and Batten Cliffs invite anyone to work in their chaotic ports. The Sleeping Towns are watched by gold dragons who prevent anyone from feeling unwelcome. The Borderlands between orc, human, and elven lands are home to varied peoples and never-ending warfare.

advancement.hint: three of your choice: (Recommended: Persuasion, Insight, and either Deception or Investigation)

advancement.title: One of Any Tool
advancement.hint:
You gain the items corresponding to the tool proficiencies you gained from this background.

If you gained proficiency in a mount or vehicle from this background, you do not gain that mount or vehicle. In that case, skip this step.
